ingredients.ingredient: ½ cup Hellmann's® or Best Foods® Real Mayonnaise
4 (5 ounce) boneless, skinless chicken breast halves
4 teaspoons Italian seasoned dry bread crumbs

cookingTips: Mix mayonnaise with Parmesan before coating chicken for better adhesion
Bake at 400°F for 20-25 minutes until chicken reaches 165°F internally
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Why does mayonnaise work so well as a binder for this crust compared to other options?
